description:
Overview
Serve desserts and snacks to your guests in style by using this silver serving bowl set from JJCR. This serving bowl set is ideal for the times when you have guests over and for special occasions and festivities. You can buy this product online for a great price at Snapdeal.
Design and Material
The most unique feature about the JJCR Silver Bowl Set of 5 is its lustre. This product is silver coated and has a luxurious look. It includes 2 serving bowls along with a tray and 2 spoons. The spoons are ergonomically designed to provide you the best of comfort and grip. This product when not in use can also be used as a decorative item. Serve your guests using these bowls and make them feel special.
Care and Maintenance
Certain things need to be kept in mind to bring out the best from this JJCR Silver Bowl Set of 5. It is important to store this product well in cool and dry place. It is also important to keep it clean after each use to avoid the formation of odour. In order to maintain the lustre of this product, mild wash is necessary.
